name: Build A Bot (Alexandress)
description:
This is a game made for Reverend during the Secret Santa Jam 2021.

This game is a fighting turn-based game where you customize your own robot and try to be the best in the arena ! Survive the longuest and get on the leaderboard to prove your worth. 🤖⚔

Controls :

Arrow keys ←↓→↑ to move.

Mouse left click to shoot.

Escape key to exit anytime.
